page.title: 20Lyndsay's Weekend
page.content: On a Saturday I get up about 9.30 and I get washed and dressed.I go downstairs and I have my breakfast, then i go off to my dancing.After dancing I come back and have my lunch.In the afternoon I go to badminton and mum takes dad to the football.After badminton I go out to play until I have my tea.After tea I go out and play until I go to bed. On a Sunday I get up at 9.30am I have my breakfast and then I get dressed.I then go to Sunday School.After Sunday School I have my lunch and then we sometimes go into my grandma's to have tea.After that we come home about 8.30 and then I go to bed.
